summary: After trying to rescue a man on the subway tracks, two teens wake up in a room dominated by a mysterious black sphere that sends them to hunt down and kill aliens hiding on Earth.
cast: Kazunari Ninomiya|Kanata Hongô|Ken'ichi Matsuyama|Natsuna|Ainosuke Shibata|Yuriko Yoshitaka|Ayumi Itô|Chieko Ichikawa|Donpei Tsuchihira|Hidekazu Nagae|Kazuhide Kobayashi|Kazuyuki Asano|Kensuke Chisaka|Matsuri Hashimoto|Merii|Motoki Ochiai|Ryûya Wakaba|Sho Igarashi|Shun'ya Shiraishi|Shuya Haruna|Takayuki Yamada|Tomorô Taguchi|A.J. Constantino|Yusuke Furusawa|Yûko Genkaku|Yuki Hamano|Yasutaka Hayakawa|Kyoji Kamui|Toshimasa Komatsu|Jeck Lubrin|Mark Muñoz|Mukau Nakamura|Raymond Firmo Narag|Bon Reyes|Charmaine Sagrado|Joarm Santiago|Kevin Santos|Aoi Tatsumi|Mitchiko Tiongson|Ayako Yoshitani
keywords: based on manga|live action remake of anime|sexy and thin|sphere|alien
title: Gantz
